Html:
Hi,
The very first experience with the NetOffice Wizard sure was impressive. An excellent masterpiece for sure.
However, with installation of the same upon my machine with VS2010 as well as VS2013 (Both Professional Versions) I have found that the wizard doesn't appear in startup screen in any of them.
Furthermore I have found the controls on the forms/taskpanes appearing in basic rectangular shapes instead of the finished smooth rounded corner ones viewed in the design mode in the Studio itself.
Any reason for the same and manner to overcome the same?
Thanx in advance.
